mapper.select:
WITH OBD1 AS ( SELECT max(idx) idx , VinCode FROM OBD_DATA WHERE TripRuntime IS NOT NULL AND idx GROUP BY VinCode ORDER BY idx DESC ), OBD2 AS ( SELECT max(idx) idx , VinCode FROM OBD_DATA WHERE CurLatitude IS NOT NULL GROUP BY VinCode ORDER BY idx desc ), OBD3 AS ( SELECT max(idx) idx , VinCode FROM OBD_DATA WHERE Speed IS NOT NULL GROUP BY VinCode ORDER BY idx DESC )
SELECT TRIP.VinCode , CAR.carId, OBD_A.TripRuntime, OBD_A.TripDistance, OBD_B.CurLatitude, OBD_B.CurLongitude, OBD_C.Speed
FROM TRIP_INFO TRIP LEFT JOIN OBD_DATA OBD_A ON OBD_A.VinCode = TRIP.VinCode AND OBD_A.idx IN (SELECT idx FROM OBD1) LEFT JOIN OBD_DATA OBD_B ON OBD_B.VinCode = TRIP.VinCode AND OBD_B.idx IN (SELECT idx FROM OBD2) LEFT JOIN OBD_DATA OBD_C ON OBD_C.VinCode = TRIP.VinCode AND OBD_C.idx IN (SELECT idx FROM OBD3) LEFT JOIN USER_CAR_INFO CAR ON CAR.VinCode = TRIP.VinCode WHERE 1=1 AND TRIP.endT IS NULL AND CAR.carId = IFNULL( #{searchId}, CAR.carId )
